casebody.data:
Jackson, ex dem. Metcalfe, v. Woodworth. THE affidavit for judgment, as in case of nonsuit in this cause, was made by the clerk of the attorney for the defendant, and though it stated a notice for trial, it did not allege that the suit was not tried. *481Weston for the "plaintiff,

reliécl' On the above circumstances as conclusive against the application.

Per Curiam.

For the reasons assigned, you can take nothing by your motion.
